00083 
00091 class CIccMpeAcs : public CIccMultiProcessElement
00092 {
00093 public:
00094   virtual ~CIccMpeAcs();
00095   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00096 
00097   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00098   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00099 
00100   virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
00101   virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
00102 
00103   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
00104 
00105   virtual bool IsAcs() { return true; }
00106 
00107   bool AllocData(icUInt32Number size);
00108   icUInt8Number* GetData() { return m_pData; }
00109   icUInt32Number GetDataSize() { return m_nDataSize; }
00110 
00111   virtual icAcsSignature GetAcsSig() { return m_signature; }
00112 
00113 protected:
00114   CIccMpeAcs();
00115   icAcsSignature m_signature;
00116 
00117   icUInt32Number m_nDataSize;
00118   icUInt8Number *m_pData;
00119 };

00130 class CIccMpeBAcs : public CIccMpeAcs
00131 {
00132 public:
00133   CIccMpeBAcs(icUInt16Number nChannels=0, icAcsSignature sig = 0);
00134   CIccMpeBAcs(const CIccMpeBAcs &elemAcs);
00135   CIccMpeBAcs &operator=(const CIccMpeBAcs &elemAcs);
00136   virtual CIccMultiProcessElement *NewCopy() const { return new CIccMpeBAcs(*this);}
00137   virtual ~CIccMpeBAcs();
00138 
00139   virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigBAcsElemType; }
00140   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeBAcs"; }
00141 
00142   virtual icAcsSignature GetBAcsSig() { return m_signature; }
00143 
00144 };

00154 class CIccMpeEAcs : public CIccMpeAcs
00155 {
00156 public:
00157   CIccMpeEAcs(icUInt16Number nChannels=0, icAcsSignature sig = 0);
00158   CIccMpeEAcs(const CIccMpeEAcs &elemAcs);

00161   virtual ~CIccMpeEAcs();
00162

00164   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeEAcs"; }
00165 
00166   virtual icAcsSignature GetEAcsSig() { return m_signature;}
